numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that Indonesia is significantly higher than every other country for young people.
2. I notice that Indonesia is significantly higher than every other country for older people.
3. I wonder what events in Indonesia caused everyone in Indonesia to be happy.
4. I wonder what events in Indonesia caused everyone in Indonesia to be optimistic about the world.
6. This shows that the younger generation is more optimistic than the older generation.
7. The title is: Is the world better?
